html:
Best Overall

EltaMD UV AOX Mist

Cons

  • Nozzle gets jammed easily

For many years, EltaMD’s tinted face sunscreen was the only SPF I felt comfortable putting on my face. Now, the dermatologist-loved formula is available in an easy-to-apply spray. A favorite of Dr. Patel, the brand’s UV AOX Mist is lightweight, water-resistant, and packed with antioxidants. Plus, it uses white-to-clear technology to ensure you never miss a spot.

SPF: 40

Size: 5 oz

Amazon rating: 3.9/5

An Amazon reviewer says: “This is light and non-greasy. Let it soak in before heading outside. I love it and will continue to purchase this.”

Best Setting Spray

One Size On ’Til Dawn Mattifying Sunscreen Setting Spray

When it comes to sweat-proof makeup, One Size’s On ’Til Dawn Setting Spray is a staple. Just in time for summer, the brand released an upgraded formula infused with SPF. The spray locks in makeup for up to 16 hours and delivers 80 minutes of sweat-resistant, broad-spectrum protection with no white cast or sticky residue.

SPF: 28

Size: 3.6 oz

Sephora rating: 4.7/5

An ELLE editor says: “As someone whose job is to wear makeup all day long, I absolutely swear by the One Size On ’Til Dawn Setting Spray. So when they released an SPF version, I had to get my hands on it. It’s definitely not as mattifying as the original formula, but I actually don’t mind that. Still, it seals in my makeup through long days (and nights), doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, and keeps my skin protected from harmful UV rays.”—Emma Aerin Becker, associate beauty e-commerce writer

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best with Niacinamide

Ultra Violette Ultra Violette Preen Screen

Pros

  • Reduces inflammation and redness

Cons

  • May burn eyes upon spraying

Ah, niacinamide—the beloved vitamin B3 known for its impressive soothing and healing properties. With Ultra Violette’s Preen Screen, you’ll get all the redness-reducing and anti-aging benefits, plus SPF 50. Spray it on clean skin, over makeup, or even on the go.

SPF: 50

Size: 1.7 oz

Sephora rating: 4.6/5

A Sephora reviewer says: “The sunscreen applies smoothly, absorbs within a few minutes, and doesn’t leave a heavy white cast. It has a lightweight feel and layers well under makeup without pilling, which is a major plus for daily use. It effectively protects my skin from sunburn during short and extended periods outside. I’ve noticed far less redness or irritation after being in the sun, and my skin tone has remained more even overall. It also helps in preventing premature aging—no new fine lines or sun spots since I started daily application.”

Best Water-Based

Hawaiian Tropic Water Sunscreen Mist

With a unique water-based formula, the Hawaiian Tropic Water Sunscreen Mist is incredibly lightweight and refreshing. It boasts SPF 30 as well as hyaluronic acid, so your skin will be both plump and protected.

SPF: 30

Size: 5.2 oz

Amazon rating: 4.7/5

An Amazon reviewer says: “This spray sunscreen smells wonderful! It sprays on a little white but immediately goes clear when rubbing it into your skin. I appreciated being able to see where I was applying it so I didn’t miss any area. Having recently dealt with skin cancer, I needed a good SPF, but I didn’t want anything stinky, thick, or sticky. This goes on easily and feels really good. It isn’t oily or thick, and smells wonderful!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best for Shimmer

Kopari Sunglaze Sheer Setting Mist

This is glass skin in a bottle. The Kopari Sunglaze Sheer Setting Mist has gone completely viral for its formula packed with SPF 50, hyaluronic acid, and a gorgeous shimmer.

SPF: 50

Size: 2.53 oz

Revolve rating: 4/5

An ELLE editor says: “Even if this setting spray didn’t have SPF 50 in it, I’d still be obsessed with it. It has an ultra-fine mist that feels extremely lightweight and hydrating, and the shimmer finish makes my skin literally reflective. I did get a few pimples after consistent application—but dare I say, it’s worth it.”—Emma Aerin Becker

Best Hydrating

Naked Sundays Hydrating Glow Mist

The Naked Sundays Hydrating Glow Mist is exactly as its name implies—a broad-spectrum spray that’s so hydrating, your skin will be glowing all day long. Formulated with skin-loving ingredients, such as Kakadu plum, hyaluronic acid, and antioxidant-packed watermelon extract, it’s suitable for all skin types and layers perfectly over or under makeup.

SPF: 50+

Size: 2.54 oz

Ulta rating: 4.8/5

An Ulta reviewer says: “This is the perfect mist to put on top of makeup to make sure you’re still protecting your face from the sun throughout the day. It’s a super-fine mist that doesn’t affect your makeup, and if you’re oily like me, this is a huge perk. I also love the scent—but also the fact that it doesn’t linger.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Derm-Approved

Sun Bum Face Mist

Pros

  • Enriched with witch hazel

Dr. Patel loves the Sun Bum Face Mist. It’s a classic—lightweight, sheer, and infused with SPF 45. Plus, it’s never greasy.

SPF: 45

Size: 3.4 oz

Amazon rating: 4.6/5

An Amazon reviewer says: “We absolutely love this face mist sunscreen for the whole family. It’s hard to find a facial SPF that doesn’t sting your eyes or feel heavy, but this one checks all the boxes. The mist is light, not aerosol-based, and super easy to apply—even on squirmy kids. It dries quickly without feeling greasy, and it doesn’t leave a white cast either. We use it on beach days, park runs, and even for everyday errands. It’s now a staple in our bag.”

Best for Sensitive Skin

Vacation Super Spritz Face Mist

I get it: As someone with sensitive skin, spraying a layer of sunscreen onto your face can feel daunting. Fortunately, Vacation’s Super Spritz Face Mist was made with sensitive skin in mind. It’s non-comedogenic, lightweight, allergy-tested, and has a subtle satin finish that makes it great for over-makeup application.

SPF: 50

Size: 2.2 oz

Nordstrom rating: 4.5/5

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “I have bought the Super Spritz Face Mist several times and I love it. It is easy to spritz your face in the AM, and then I keep one in my purse for spritzing on the go! It is not sticky and dries quickly. It is clear and sprays like water. Dries within seconds.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best with Antioxidants

Coola Classic Face Sunscreen Mist

Powered by an antioxidant-rich Plant Protection complex, the Coola Classic Face Sunscreen Mist provides extra-strong protection from UV radiation, pollution, and free radicals. It sprays on like a breeze—over makeup, on the go, or at the beach.

SPF: 50

Size: 3.4 oz

Amazon rating: 4.1/5

An Amazon reviewer says: “Love this face spray sunscreen. It is non-greasy and does not sting going on. It also works well—no sunburns. My kids and I love it!”

Suncreen Mists for Face Vs. Body

According to Dr. Patel, the main differences between face and body sunscreens fall into two categories: formulation and application. Face sunscreen mists are “typically made to be lighter and non-comedogenic,” she explains. “They often include additional skin care ingredients, such as antioxidants and moisturizing agents, and are designed to be gentle on the more sensitive skin of the face.” On the other hand, body sunscreen mists are usually thicker and may contain more active ingredients to provide a higher level of protection. They may also be more water-resistant to withstand sweat and water exposure.

When it comes to application, face mists are often designed for easy application over makeup, allowing for quick and easy touch-ups throughout the day. Not only are many body mists not suitable for over makeup, but the oils they contain could actually make your makeup melt off.
